text:
Teachers need to be vaccinated ASAP so we ensure full staffing capacity, keeping schools open for F2F teaching, counselling, wellbeing & safeguarding support. Learners have suffered enough!
#KeepWalesLearning #BackToSchool2021 #COVID19 #vaccine #exams2021 #assessments2021 https://t.co/JJXGUHX6xx
